reviewText: Love Stackem Track Chief Wilson and all the other Carecters! Keeps my little Chugger entertain so Nana can get her jobs done. Chuggington is upbeat and always teaching something. Carecters are always happy and are very sweet "looking". Not scary like Thomas the Train.

My girls love Chuggington. This DVD contains six episodes from the Disney Jr. cartoon. Amazon doesn't always do a good job on their DVD episode listings so here are the episodes that are included on this DVD:

1. Chief Wilson
2. Magnetic Wilson
3. Undercover Action Chugger
4. Stop Koko Stop
5. Chugger of the Year
6. Wilson's Wacky Tour
